TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AlwaysOnHotwordDetector extends Java.Lang.Object

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Content.Intent CreateEnrollIntent() cil managed
Public Overridable Function CreateEnrollIntent () As Intent
abstract member CreateEnrollIntent : unit -> Android.Content.Intent override this.CreateEnrollIntent : unit -> Android.Content.Intent

Docs.summary: Creates an intent to start the enrollment for the associated keyphrase.
Docs.returns: An Intent to start enrollment for the given keyphrase.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if managing they keyphrase isn't supported. Callers should only call this method after a supported state callback on AlwaysOnHotwordDetector Callback onAvailabilityChanged(int) to avoid this exception.
if the detector is in an invalid state. This may happen if another detector has been instantiated or the hosting this detector has been shut down.

Docs.summary: Set a model specific ModelParams with the given value.
Docs.returns: - SoundTrigger#STATUS_OK in case of success - SoundTrigger#STATUS_NO_INIT if the native service cannot be reached - SoundTrigger#STATUS_BAD_VALUE invalid input parameter - SoundTrigger#STATUS_INVALID_OPERATION if the call is out of sequence or if API is not supported by HAL

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool StartRecognition(valuetype Android.Service.Voice.RecognitionFlag recognitionFlags) cil managed
Public Overridable Function StartRecognition (recognitionFlags As RecognitionFlag) As Boolean
abstract member StartRecognition : Android.Service.Voice.RecognitionFlag -> bool override this.StartRecognition : Android.Service.Voice.RecognitionFlag -> bool

Docs.param: The flags to control the recognition properties.
Docs.summary: Starts recognition for the associated keyphrase.
Docs.returns: Indicates whether the call succeeded or not.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the recognition isn't supported. Callers should only call this method after a supported state callback on AlwaysOnHotwordDetector Callback onAvailabilityChanged(int) to avoid this exception.
if the detector is in an invalid state. This may happen if another detector has been instantiated or the hosting this detector has been shut down.
